title: What is the perfect death or ending in Islam? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: aisha says what's what is said to be the perfect death or ending in islam the perfect death and ending in islam is to die upon tawheed not doing sins and to conclude your death with the kalima the prophet said alas whoever concludes his life whoever his life ends where the last thing he said was he would not taste hellfire another nation he will enter paradise so this is the perfect ending in islam this is the best ending in islam of course along with dying on a friday along with dying as a martyr along with many things and larson knows best
